properties.entry: SELECT PRODUCT_NO ,PRODUCT_BRAND ,PRODUCT_NAME ,PRODUCT_PRICE ,PRODUCT_INFO ,PRODUCT_INGREDIENT FROM PRODUCTS WHERE PRODUCT_NO = ?
SELECT FILE_NO ,ORIGIN_NAME ,CHANGE_NAME ,FILE_PATH ,FILE_LEVEL FROM PRODUCTS_ATTACHMENT WHERE PRODUCT_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT REVIEW_NO ,USER_NO ,REVIEW_CONTENT FROM REVIEW WHERE PRODUCT_NO = ?

SELECT PRODUCT_NO ,PRODUCT_NAME ,FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME TITLEIMG ,CATEGORY_NAME FROM PRODUCTS P JOIN CATEGORY C USING (CATEGORY_NO) JOIN PRODUCTS_ATTACHMENT PA USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY P.CREATE_DATE DESC
